title: 05/12/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/12/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, we discuss the NFL' schedule release, the aftermath of Bob Baffert and the NBA Playoffs. Sports Illustrated's Pat Forde joins us to help answer questions about Medina Spirit and Bob Baffert. Mike Florio of Pro Football Talk explains why he thinks he will see Tim Tebow in a regular season game for the Jaguars this season. And Former NBA player Channing Frye calls in and shares which former NBA player's house is the biggest he's been to.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
